intrusive: For the total weld area: 100% WFMT/ACFM with UT follow-up of relevant indications
non_intrusive: For the total weld area: 100% automated or manual ultrasonic scanning

intrusive: For selected welds/weld area: > 75% WFMT/ACFM with UT follow-up of all relevant indications
non_intrusive: For selected welds/weld area: > 75% automated or manual ultrasonic scanning OR AE testing with 100% follow-up of relevant indications

intrusive: For selected welds/weld area: > 35% WFMT/ACFM with UT follow-up of all relevant indications
non_intrusive: For selected welds/weld area: > 35% automated or manual ultrasonic scanning OR > 35% RT

intrusive: For selected welds/weld area: > 10% WFMT/ACFM with UT follow-up of all relevant indications
non_intrusive: For selected welds/weld area: > 10% automated or manual ultrasonic scanning OR > 10% RT
